title: Silver ADC main looking for people to que with. [Info inside]
body:
Just trying to climb, I'll try to keep it short and sweet.

Looking for 2 people to duo queue with, preferred 1 to be a support who play's champs with hard cc. Leona, Thresh, Blitz, Nautilus, Lux, Nami, Morgana types.

Second person can main any other role as long as when I look you up you have good stats in your role and can play more than 1 champion in the case that you get countered.. 

Here are my stats, I intend to play mostly Caitlin, I'm in the midst of switching my main champion to her and have been spamming her when I can get ADC.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/34790332#ranked-stats

I'm currently silver 1

DISCLAIMER - IF YOU'RE THE TYPE WHO ARE GOING TO TRY AND TELL ME HOW TO BUILD AND HOW TO PLAY MY POSITION DON'T BOTHER CONTACTING ME.

replies.body:
Hey I am silver 5, and my IGN: IAmBoostedApe

Jungle main.
what, that great discord group not working for you buddy
